title: One Piece Episode 425, "The Strongest Man in the Prison! Poison Man Magellan Appears" â€“ SideReel Review
author: SideReel
description: A review of Episode 425 published shortly after the episode aired. The reviewer praised the chase scenes as reminiscent of Tom and Jerry cartoons, highlighting comic moments from the hippo and praying mantis. Notes that Magellan is introduced after a series of toilet jokes and silly lines.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Review focuses only on Episode 425 content

title: One Piece Eps 422-425
author: One Piece with a Lime
description: A podcast episode covering One Piece episodes 422-425, discussing the Impel Down arc including Magellan's debut and the events on Level 2.

title: ONE PIECE EPISODE 425 REACTION!!!
author: Unknown Creator
description: A Patreon-exclusive reaction video for One Piece Episode 425, featuring first-time reactions to Magellan's debut.

title: One Piece: This Underappreciated Character Defeated 3 Future Emperors, And No One Cares
author: GameRant
description: An article analyzing Magellan's power and his underappreciated status in the One Piece fandom, discussing how he defeated three future Emperors (Luffy, Blackbeard pirates) during the Impel Down arc.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains spoilers about future events and character developments

title: One Piece: Who is Magellan from Impel Down?
author: ComingSoon.net
description: A character guide article explaining Magellan's role in the Impel Down arc, his abilities, and his significance to the story.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains spoilers for entire Impel Down arc
